entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND NOT AS COOL

SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY

NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR

LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
